title: HOUR 3 - Torry Holt, Rams v.s. Cardinals
itunes:title: HOUR 3 - Torry Holt, Rams v.s. Cardinals
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, all-time Ram great Torry Holt joins the show to help Colin preview the Arizona Cardinals-Los Angeles Rams playoff game, as well as reflect on this past weekend's gridiron results. Finally, Colin plays his Three Word Game.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
